definition: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)/abbr. to 文聯|文联
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Wen2 xue2 Yi4 shu4 jie4 Lian2 he2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国文学艺术界联合会

definition: Mao Dun Literature Prize, PRC prize for novel writing, awarded since 1982

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 后印象派反映了大量与文学象征主义相似的态度。

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，它算得上美国最珍贵的文学遗产之一。

sentences.english: I also love classical literature, and Cao Xueqin is one of my favorite authors.
sentences.chinese: 我还喜欢古典文学，曹雪芹是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四节分析评述科举入仕之工商子弟的文学创作活动。

sentences.english: Since 2002 she has drowned herself in the study of American literature.
sentences.chinese: 从2002年以来她一直埋头研究美国文学。

sentences.english: High I feel that I do most of the one thing that is out of the literary agency.
sentences.chinese: 高二我觉得我做的最对的一件事就是退出了文学社。

sentences.english: In Chapter 1, the concerned symbolic literary theories are introduced here synoptically.
sentences.chinese: 第一章对象征文学理论进行了概括性的介绍。

sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《礼拜六》是民国初年市民文学期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: The history of Han literature on Ryukyu Islands is a topic that no body has studied yet.
sentences.chinese: 琉球汉文学史是一个尚无人研究的课题。

sentences.english: She has contributed to literary magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她给几家文学刊物投了稿。

sentences.english: This double-degree is jointly offered by the Faculty of Arts and the Faculty of Education.
sentences.chinese: 此项双学位课程由文学院与教育学院合办。

sentences.english: Why to examine the difference between literary language to the difference from the genre?
sentences.chinese: 为什么从体裁差别的角度去探讨文学语言的区别。

sentences.english: His poetic achievement stands at the center of modern literature.
sentences.chinese: 他是最优秀的英文诗人之一，是现代文学的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: "Non-instructive" teaching can firstly be used in literature teaching.
sentences.chinese: “非指示性”教育首先用于文学作品的阅读欣赏教学。

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly discusses Dingli's commercial literary view.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要论述了丁力的商情文学观。
